episodes.title: Trump Builds Personality Cult as Democracy Crumbles Part 2
episodes.description: Part 2 of Mary Trump and Ruth Ben Ghiat exposing how Donald Trump is remaking America in his image—renaming institutions, flooding culture with propaganda, and accelerating an authoritarian power grab. Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
